articles.description:
FOMO HOUR EP213. Memecoins take off, funding stays low, China stocks keep on rising!
Many altcoins & memecoins soar despite stable BTC. Funding rates continue to be low or negative. Crypto funds saw $147m of outflows last week. BTC remains best performing major assets this year. SUI breaks into the top 20 coins again. TAO leads top 100 away from memes, sifu shorts. $100m bridge to SOL over the last 7 days. Metaplanet buys $6.7m more BTC. ETH proposal aims to improve throughput 50%. EIGEN, OP, APT lead token unlocks this week.
articles.title: Memecoins take off, funding stays low, China stocks keep on rising!

articles.description: Coinbase VP of Corporate and Business Development, Shan Aggarwal, joined Decrypt's Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano at Messari Mainnet 2024 to discuss the exchange's efforts to grow mainstream crypto adoption—and how the changing political conversation around digital assets is rapidly playing a major role in that.
articles.title: Why Coinbase Sees Crypto as a Bipartisan, 'Purple' Political Issue

articles.description: Nils Anderson Röed, the exchange’s global head of financial investigations, sat down with Decrypt’s Sander Lutz at Messari Mainnet 2024 to discuss how Binance is proactively dismantling criminal networks around the world, the strategy with which the crypto exchange is approaching sensitive conflicts in the Middle East, and more.
articles.title: Binance Is Playing Offense—Not Just Defense—Against Crypto Crime, Says Head of Financial Investigations

articles.description: Payrolls Higher than expected, Bitcoin reacts hard. Crypto sank early in the week as Middle East tensions spooked markets. Powell signals two more rate cuts this year. SUI leads L1s again, nears YTD high despite large unlock. Majority of FTX repayments still months away. EIGEN becomes non-transferable, hits $6bn FDV. SEC to appeal Ripple securities law ruling. Visa launches tokenization platform for banks. SWIFT plans digital asset trial in 2025. ByBit launched trading of global stock indices. SPX, GIGA & FWOG hit ATHs, most memes fall. XCOPY to release 250 piece collection on Shape. HBO documentary claims to have identified Satoshi.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 212 - SEEDPHRASE TALKS ART!

articles.description: Altcoins sink, BTC dominance nears cycle high. BTC in ‘three blind mice’ downtrend. Tron revenue hits record $577m in Q3. ByBit to launch trading of major stock indices. Franklin Templeton launch fund on APT. SWIFT banks to trial digital assets in 2025. Aerodrome hits $1bn TVL on Base. Cronje calls out Aerodrome for copyright. ETH ICO wallet sells $47m. SEC files appeal against Ripple ruling. EIGEN falls 20% on staking rewards FUD. FTX to auction off WLD position. Half of US voters think crypto ‘important’. North Korea ‘infiltrating’ crypto industry. Snowden challenged over SOL centralisation view. Top SEC official on crypto set to depart.
articles.title: Altcoins bleed, ByBit launches stock index trading, POCHITA soars

articles.title: DACOM Summit: Fastex CLO Vardan Khachatryan on Crypto Compliance

articles.description: Crypto drops as Middle East tensions flare. $500m liquidations in drop. BTC ETFs see largest outflows in a month. Fidelity ETH ETF sees 2nd highest outflow ever. SUI hits 6-month highs, bridge goes live on mainnet. Hashdex set to launch XRP ETF. Wormhole leads altcoin gains after Upbit lists. BTC miners hit record low profits in September Crypto hackers stole $750m in Q3. Telegram has been disclosing IPs since 2018.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 210 - MIDDLE EAST TENSIONS RISE

articles.title: Rep. Tom Emmer Is Confident Crypto Laws Are Coming Soon—No Matter Who Wins the Election

articles.description: BTC ETFs see inflows for 8 straight days. SUI enters top 20, $110m of unlocks today. SOL weekly DEX volume flips ETH. Firedancer sees very fast TPS on Testnet. ETH gas up 500% in 2 weeks. EIGEN opens at $7bn FDV. FTX creditors vote in favour of restructuring plan. Dell to sell another $1.2bn Dell stock. Metaplanet buys another 107 BTC.Grayscale opens decentralised AI fund to investors. Robinhood allows crypto transfer in EU. Pollak to head Coinbase Wallet & join exec team. Gemini to close in Canada. Japan considers lower cap gains tax on crypto. Ohio bill would make it legal to pay taxes in crypto. Trump project opens whitelist to non-US users. CZ pledges to invest in blockchain companies.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 209 - LET UPTOBER BEGIN!

articles.description: Decrypt Reporters Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano spoke with Binance CEO Richard Teng about the crypto exchange's progress on establishing a global headquarters, improving its relationships with regulators, and expanding its global presence in the wake of founder Changpeng "CZ" Zhao's jailing in the U.S.
articles.title: Binance CEO Richard Teng Talks Progress on Exchange's Global Regulatory Goals

articles.description: Kamala signals support for crypto. Top memecoins all soar, add $10bn in value in a week. MOODENG hits $180m, does 11x in a week. SUI & SEI continue to lead L1s for price & TVL growth. Revolut & Robinhood are considering stablecoin. Visa launches new tokenisation platform for banks. PayPal to allow business accounts to hold crypto Hamster kombat's HMSTER disappoints on launch. Biden admin may have forced Silvergate’s closure. Court rules crypto mining boxes ‘are securities’.

articles.description: BTC nears $65k key resistance level. Kamala makes positive comments about crypto. PayPal allows businesses to hold crypto. Visa allows banks to test RWAs & smart contracts. Cuban wants to be head of SEC. Silvergate claims about ‘Chokepoint 2.0’ grow. Truflation hacked for $5m. Telegram Wallet blocked in UK & US. Court rules crypto mining boxes are securities. Infinex DeFi platform raises $65m. Ethena announces new stablecoin linked to BUIDL.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 206 - MEMES ARE PUMPING!

articles.description: SUI leads L1 gains as TVL crosses $1bn. Altcoin market cap close to breaking downtrend. SEI becomes top chain for 1 month TVL growth. ETH ETFs sees 3rd largest inflow ever. SEC delays ETH ETF options decision. SOL took most of ETH outflows over last 3 months. SOLETH continues to be trading at resistance. $8.1bn BTC options to expire this week. BTC heading to $500k-$1m in a year: PlanB. Stablecoin supply hits new ATH. Caroline Ellison sentenced to 2 years in jail. SBF & Diddy in the same jail. SEC settles against TUSD for not being collateralised. Gensler gets derided for crypto approach. Hester Pierce admits flaws in SEC crypto policy. Harris against regulation by litigation: Cuban. Golem claims ETH move to CEXs due to staking. Binance refutes data leak claims. Next Y combinator batch has ‘no crypto companies’. Celo overtakes Tron for stablecoin addresses.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 205 - ALTCOINS CONTINUE TO RALLY!

articles.description: BTC needs to top $65.2k to put in a higher high. ETH ETFs see biggest outflow since July. ETH outperformance could be start of ‘alt season’. BlackRock gets 12hr BTC withdrawal from Coinbase. cbBTC only wrapped BTC to not show reserves. Telegram to share user data upon legal requests. EIGEN non-transferability to be removed Sep 30th. TIA announces $100m funding round. TIA deal was OTC token sale ‘done months ago’. Polymarket considers token, trying $50m raise. Maybe we will pay off debt with crypto: Trump. Harris unlikely to give full crypto policy pre-election. 13m Binance users’ data may have been leaked. Caroline Ellison likely won’t serve time in jail.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 204 - MOODENG MOO-NING!

articles.description: Crypto funds saw $321m inflows last week. Kamala commits to crypto & AI expansion. TAO leads gains in AI hype, does 2x in 2 weeks. SUI TVL breaks $900m. Average Q4 returns for BTC is 88%. BTC Google searches down 75% since 2021. BTC 161 days from halving, when it rallied in 2020. Crypto VCs raised $2.2bn this year, well below 2021.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 203 - KAMALA GOES PRO-CRYPTO

articles.description: SOL leads majors as Breakpoint begins. SOL launches Frankendancer on mainnet. Helio Pay allows Shopify items to sell on X. Franklin Templeton to launch fund on SOL. BTC short term holders fall at fastest rate in 12 years. MicroStrategy upsizes convertible note raise to $1bn. BingX loses $52m in hack. $243m crypto heist exposed by ZachXBT. Supreme Court of India hacked on X, shills scam. SocGen launches Euro stablecoin on SOL. Sky agrees to stop using WBTC. Germany shuts down 47 crypto exchanges. Stablecoin’s now 18th biggest holder of treasuries. Consensys lawsuit against SEC dismissed. Partisanship will stop Trump crypto plans: Hoskinson. Scaramucci working with Kamala on crypto.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 202 - SOL STARTS TO SEND IT

articles.description: Crypto rips higher after Fed cuts 50bps. $22bn shorts would be liquidated by $70.5k. SUI continues to lead L1s, does 2.5x in a month. Trump buys burgers with Bitcoin. Bitcoin is hedge against US debt: BlackRock. Commerzbank to offer BTC & ETH trading. Solana unveils Seeker phone, $70m pre-orders Helius Labs raise $21.75m. WazirX hacker moves $32m ETH to Tornado cash. SEC made up crypto regulation ‘out of thin air’. BitGo to launch stablecoin. Revolut considers creating stablecoin. Ethena front-end gets hacked, funds safe.

articles.author: Dalmas Ngetich
articles.description:
NFTs dominated headlines from late 2020 throughout 2021 before peaking in early 2022. By November 2020, the global NFT sales volume was around $8 million. 
 
NFT Market Down 92% From January 2022 Peaks: Best Time To Invest?
 
However, roughly 13 months later, this had grown to over $6 billion. The rapid growth was pumped partly by the excess market liquidity due to record low interest rates. Due to the accommodative policy, Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, and even the BNB Chain ecosystems grew.
 
 
Fast forward two years later, and NFTs are in shambles and struggling. Throughout 2022 and 2023, the trajectory has been downward, looking at CryptoSlam data. When writing on October 9, the global sale volume for all NFTs was around $100 million in early October.
 
 
This figure is nothing compared t…
articles.title: NFT Market Down 92%, Analyst Thinks This Is The Best Time To Invest

articles.description: Ripple has been named a Platinum Winner for Best Cross-Border Payments Platform in Juniper Research’s 2024 Future Digital Awards for Fintech & Payments. Other winners included Huawei for mobile money, SAP Fioneer for banking-as-a-service, and Paymentology for embedded finance, highlighting a year of varied fintech advancements. Ripple Wins at 2024 Future Digital Awards Juniper Research […]
articles.title: Ripple Wins Platinum for Best Cross-Border Payments Platform at Future Digital Awards 2024

articles.author: Jake Simmons
articles.description:
The new HBO documentary “Money Electric: The Bitcoin Mystery,” which aired on October 8, has ignited intense debate within the crypto community. The film suggests that Canadian Bitcoin developer Peter Todd is Satoshi Nakamoto. However, Todd himself has publicly denied this identification.
 
In response to the documentary’s claims, several experts have come forward to debunk the theory proposed by director Cullen Hoback, who based his conclusion on four arguments, as reported by Bitcoinist earlier today. Among those refuting the claim is Billy Markus, co-founder of Dogecoin and known online as Shibetoshi Nakamoto. Taking to X, Markus stated, “It’s not Peter Todd bro.”
 
When a user asked, “Who’s Peter?”, Markus replied, “Not Satoshi unless you’re an idiot. […] He’s one of the more OG core d…
articles.title: Dogecoin Founder Reveals Who He Believes Is Satoshi Nakamoto

articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description: The Ohio Bureau of Criminal Investigation’s new Electronic Fraud Investigations unit has recovered $130,000 from a cryptocurrency scam in its first victory. The unit was established to address the growing complexity of cyber financial crimes, particularly those involving cryptocurrency. Ohio’s New Fraud Unit Recovers $130K From Crypto Scam Ohio Attorney General Dave Yost announced on […]
articles.title: Ohio’s New Crypto Fraud Unit Claims First Victory, Recovers $130K From Scam

articles.author: Scott Matherson
articles.description:
BONK, a Solana-based meme coin, has been stuck in a tight range in the past 24 hours as it reaches a critical junction that will determine whether a rally occurs in the coming days. Reaching this critical junction comes on the heels of interesting price action in the past seven days, which saw the meme coin break above and immediately crash in less than 24 hours.
 
Now, the BONK price is consolidating after reaching a support. According to crypto analyst World Of Charts, this consolidation phase is generating the momentum needed for a potential breakout, with the next move likely to push prices higher. 
 
Massive BONK Price Breakout Incoming
 
Crypto analyst World Of Charts recently took to social media platform X to reveal an interesting analysis of the recent BONK price action. Accompany…
articles.title: Analyst Predicts Massive Breakout For BONK Price, Here’s The Target

articles.author: Rubmar Garcia
articles.description:
Holonym Foundation partnered with Renzo Protocol, an Ethereum Liquid Restaking Protocol, to strengthen the Mishti network’s security and the company’s Digital Identity Solution: Human Keys.
 
 
Ethereum Liquid Restaking Protocol Joins Holonym Foundation
 
The Holonym Foundation, which focuses on Digital Identity Solutions, revealed its collaboration with Renzo Protocol. The liquid restaking protocol will restake $800 million worth of ezETH to enhance the security of Holonym’s Mishti Network.
 
The protocol will use Ethereum and EigenLayer’s infrastructure and node operators to support Mitshti Network’s secure creation of Human Keys, Holonym’s digital identity solution. The partnership will allow users to generate keys using biometrics or social media accounts while ensuring flexibility and…
articles.title: Ethereum Liquid Restaking Protocol Joins Holonym Foundation To Enhance Human Keys’ Security

articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description: Global investment bank UBS remains optimistic about market prospects despite escalating geopolitical tensions in the Middle East. While fighting between Israel and Hezbollah and missile attacks from Iran have caused concern, oil prices are stable, gold remains near record highs, and U.S. recession fears are easing. UBS advises investors to hold onto risk assets, citing […]
articles.title: UBS Maintains Optimism in Markets Amid Middle East Uncertainty

articles.author: Scott Matherson
articles.description:
The Dogecoin price could soon witness another price rally following a recent accumulation trend from crypto whales. Onchain data shows that these whales have bought billions of DOGE tokens in the last week, which could trigger a price surge for the foremost meme coin. 
 
Dogecoin Price Could Rally As Whales Buy Over 2 Billion DOGE
 
The Dogecoin price could surge as whales have bought 2.07 billion DOGE tokens in the last week. Data from the market intelligence platform IntoTheBlock shows this was the large holder’s netflow over the seven days. This netflow refers to the difference in how much these Dogecoin whales withdrew from exchanges and how much they transferred to exchanges. 
 
 
Interestingly, Bitcoinist reported that these Dogecoin whales bought over 1 billion DOGE tokens ($108 mil…
articles.title: Dogecoin Price Eyes Fresh Recovery As Whales Load Up 2.07 Billion DOGE In One Week

articles.author: Christian Encila
articles.description:
Coinbase is warning of a concerning trend: Gen Z is becoming more susceptible to online fraudsters. The cryptocurrency exchange published a blog post on October 8 that identified four significant threats that youthful users should be cognizant of. These consist of recovery schemes, phony websites, romance scams, and social media fraud.
 
 
Coinbase cautioned that because of the increased growth of digital currencies, users are liable for their assets as such do not enjoy any protection like that of a traditional financial system.
 
Lately, social media scams have started to rise, targeting unsuspecting people, especially those with little knowledge about crypto. Ironically, even those who’ve been dealing with cryptocurrencies still fall for the trap.
 
Coinbase: Beware Of The Trap
 
Some o…
articles.title: Coinbase Sounds The Alarm: Gen Z Targeted By Crypto Scams

articles.author: Terence Zimwara
articles.description: The Nigerian Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) vows to crack down on fraud, money laundering, and market manipulation in the crypto sector. The SEC director general, Emomotimi Agama, emphasized the importance of educating investors. Lagos State Governor Babajide Sanwo-Olu said he supports regulating the crypto sector. Investor Education Nigeria’s securities regulator vows to crack down […]
articles.title: Nigerian Regulator Pledges to Fight Crypto Fraud

articles.description: One observer noted 7,000 PlusToken-related ETH transferred to crypto exchanges on Wednesday, raising concerns about potential selling pressure.
articles.title: Bitcoin Dips Below $61K, Ether Slips 3% as Some PlusToken China Ponzi-Related Coins Moved to Exchanges

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: Compass Mining has announced a partnership with Mindshift, a licensed digital asset service provider in South Korea, to extend bitcoin mining services to the region. The collaboration aims to address challenges like high electricity costs while making bitcoin mining more accessible to South Korean residents. Compass Mining Collaborates With Mindshift The partnership between Compass Mining, […]
articles.title: Compass Mining Partners With Mindshift to Expand Bitcoin Mining in South Korea

articles.author: Cheyenne Ligon
articles.description: Gensler also called out fraud in crypto: “With all respect, the leading lights of this field in 202[4] are either in jail or awaiting extradition right now.”
articles.title: SEC Chair Gary Gensler on Crypto: ‘It’s Unlikely This Stuff is Gonna Be a Currency’

articles.author: Godspower Owie
articles.description:
Bitcoin might be having trouble initiating a major rally soon, however, investors’ interest in the flagship digital asset appears to be growing as the number of active addresses has begun to rise once again, indicating heightened engagement from both old and new investors.
 
Bitcoin Active Addresses Regains Steam
 
In a positive and significant development, the number of active Bitcoin addresses has rebounded sharply in light of ongoing market fluctuation, highlighting renewed interest and network activity. The chief crypto analyst at Real Vision, Jamie Coutts shared the development on the X (formerly Twitter) platform on Tuesday.
 
 
This resurgence in active BTC addresses comes after a lengthy downtrend, which lasted for about 11 months, signaling a possible shift in market dynamics. Fol…
articles.title: Bitcoin On-Chain Activity Heats Up: Active Addresses Count Sees Sudden Rebound

This achievement wasn’t just the standard KYC check but was done with special distinction. The ABD Systems team […]
articles.title: ABDS Token Receives Top CertiK Badge for KYC

articles.author: Sergio Goschenko
articles.description: JAN3 CEO Samson Mow suggested that traditional financial institutions operate in the shadows to prevent more nations from following El Salvador’s path of integrating Bitcoin into their financial systems. Mow commented on a specific case involving the World Bank and another nation. JAN3 CEO Samson Mow: ‘Covert Operations’ Are Undermining Countries’ Will of Adopting Bitcoin […]
articles.title: JAN3 CEO Samson Mow Warns of ‘Covert Operations’ to Subvert State-Level Bitcoin Adoption
